hero.title: La Opala Tableware for Modern Homes
hero.subtitle: Premium opalware and glassware curated by FARMERZ — importer & distributor. Lightweight, durable, and timelessly white.

about.title: About FARMERZ
about.body: FARMERZ is an importer & distributor specializing in La Opala opalware and quality glassware. We focus on timeless white, premium materials, and a clean, minimalist presentation.
